text: Mário Kurák (born 30 November 1983) is a professional Slovak footballer who currently plays for DOXXbet liga club FK Poprad as a midfielder. ==Club career== ===MFK Skalica=== He made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for MFK Skalica against MFK Ružomberok on 18 July 2015.MFK Ružomberok – MFK Skalica 18.07.2015, onlajny.eu ==References== ==External links== * * Futbalnet profile * Eurofotbal profile Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FK Železiarne Podbrezová players Category:FK Čáslav players Category:FK Mladá Boleslav players Category:TJ Baník Ružiná players Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:MŠK Rimavská Sobota players Category:MFK Tatran Liptovský Mikuláš players Category:MFK Skalica players Category:FK Dukla Banská Bystrica players Category:FK Poprad players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary
title: Mário Kurák
